website_summaries.verdict: An all-around excellent choice if you're looking for a high quality detector that does its job very well.
pros: Display is clear and very bright
Easy to set up and use
cons: The train crossing indicator seems a bit hit or miss, as sometimes it sounds when you are nowhere near a track
Some issues with the screen dying after a year or so

customer_reviews.title: Dead right out of the box, and 2 YEARS OBSOLETE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this up, plugged it in, turned it on and the display is completely dead. Called Cobra direct- only to hear that this unit has been out of their product line for more than 2 years. I was advised to send it in to Chicago immediately, and they will replace it with a current model. So kiddies, the lesson here is- CHECK THE MFR WEBSITE TO SEE IF WHAT YOU ARE ORDERING FROM AMAZON IS A CURRENT MODEL!! NEW DOESN'T ALWAYS MEAN CURRENT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this detector. Plugged in and right away it started beeping, and basically never stopped. It would pause about 3 seconds and then start beeping again. It did not matter what mode it was in or where I was driving, city, HW, driveway etc, it never let up. I do not know if this particular unit was defective or if the detector model itself has these difficulties. I was sorry it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: good radar protector for the price
customer_reviews.text: this will sync with Bluetooth to your phone so you can use the iRadar app. the color LCD is nice but it is starting to dim and is not as bright even at full brightness settings. you can control almost all menu options from your phone once it is synced. i have noticed the IntelliMute feature is not programmable from the phone so it is very awkward and dangerous to use the Settings button while driving in order to set the IntelliMute RPM.
customer_reviews.author: eph

customer_reviews.title: Great Detector, Low volume if not used with BT
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, and seems to have a very decent range. The only downfall I have found on this is that the volume is very low unless it is paired through a BT radio. It will then play all sounds through your speakers. My only problem is that I have a android deck in my car that does not support this BT item, so I have to run BT from my phone, to the android deck, disabling the use of the built in apps of my deck. I use a 7": ATOTO android deck.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great! I am very pleased with the delivery and performance of this mid-priced detector.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Best price ever
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well so far. Also in extreme heat and cold. Just has to be set up correctly to prevent false alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 months then one day just quit working. It doesn't power up. The power adapter works so I know for sure it's the device. It was never moved from where I installed it which was on the dash of my car. I'm very dissatisfied with this radar. I'll never purchase a Cobra product again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cano

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good mid-line product.
customer_reviews.text: The connection to my phone adds a lot of value to this device. Other people on the cobra network use the app to report non-signal transmitting traps (like traffic light cameras and common speed trap areas). The only complaint is that for some reason tractor trailers I pass sometimes set the device off for a second or two.
customer_reviews.author: dasackis

customer_reviews.title: this item arrived not working and I heard NOTHING from the seller. I was a gift for my now DEAD MOM.
customer_reviews.text: this product arrived not working no power cable screen not working in a box of old news papers. not packed right not anything right. all for several hundreds of dollars. all my MOM did was cry. these people should be held responsible for all items they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stevens

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So many false alerts that its useless. Care to pay a ticket?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mysteriouso

customer_reviews.title: great product, it alerted my of a highway patrol ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, it alerted my of a highway patrol about 3 miles in front of me. which was more than enough time to slow down. i also like the city settings, it filters out false alarms very well. all in all it is a great product for the price. good job cobra!
customer_reviews.author: jonny66

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems...
customer_reviews.text: Had very poor range with picking up signals tried it's range with friends radar gun. Only worked up to 150 yards. Then the volume quit working on it after only a month. I really regret getting this model.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Manalli

customer_reviews.title: This radar detector has a lot of false alerts but ...
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector has a lot of false alerts but has never failed me when a cop is running radar
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, but the brightness of the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, but the brightness of the screen faded out, can't see it anymore, the one with red dots would be easier to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great radar detector!
customer_reviews.text: Currently hangs in my jeep as I type this! I love it. It let's me know where the police and emergency vehicles are! Very compact and out of the line of sight.
customer_reviews.author: TFack

customer_reviews.title: I have liked cobra radar detectors in the past
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. almost continually alerted, even way out on country roads. I sent it back. I have liked cobra radar detectors in the past, but they do wear out. I miss the voice prompting of road hazards ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Just listen to the other reviews. It's a POS ...
customer_reviews.text: Just listen to the other reviews. It's a POS. Waited too long and can't replace. Will never buy another Cobra item.
customer_reviews.author: TheTort

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt pick up any bands at all
customer_reviews.text: It no longer works or picks up any radar or laser
customer_reviews.author: Jess Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job at pointing out sneaky hiding officers in my commute via interstate to work. :)
customer_reviews.text: It's a learning process (or curve in my situation). The product is aesthetically pleasing and feels like it is well constructed. The little window mount is blah, but does the job thus far. Used it this morning on my way to work and realized I've been passing angry officers and not knowing it! Lots of "Pop" signals and Ka signals on the detector. Within a few moments, voila! Officer! Amazing...lol. Will come in really handy on trips, I'm certain. I hope it at least helps the husband from getting any more driving awards...lmbo! I think I would buy it again at this point. We'll see in a few weeks if I still feel the same.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Screen is dim... But has saved me a few times
customer_reviews.author: A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very nice detector
customer_reviews.text: Nice detector. Doesn't go off too often but can detect PO sometimes miles ahead. Very nice. Would purchase again!! I drive a BMW 335i w/sports package. I have not received a ticket yet. Have had it over 11,000 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Young

customer_reviews.title: The LCD screen went dark after a couple of years ...
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen went dark after a couple of years. Thus, you cant change any settings, But it still detected radar so I guess it could be classified as still working, but not as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far works good. always use the blue tooth connection to my cell phone for the gps.
customer_reviews.author: R. GIRDNER

customer_reviews.title: can be annoying. It does detect police radar though
customer_reviews.text: Picks up every signal known to man, can be annoying. It does detect police radar though.
customer_reviews.author: Elroy

customer_reviews.title: ) Good detector, especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Works with or without smartphone. (you need the smartphone and Cobra app to use the GPS features.) Good detector, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Suda Nim

customer_reviews.title: too late!
customer_reviews.text: Warns you when you are being hit by radar, not before.
customer_reviews.author: Brummy's Dummies

customer_reviews.title: Great  Technology
customer_reviews.text: Awesome technology great product I bought this for my dad for Christmas unfortunately it would not work on his windows phone but there is an app you can download that run simultaneously with this product works with android and iPhone I highly recommend this if you want to keep up with the Jones
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Most expensive unit I have ever owned and the best
customer_reviews.text: Has the best range and lower false alarms then other units I have owned. Overall worth the extra money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of ok, I think it gives some false alerts too.
customer_reviews.author: Naser Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Good...
customer_reviews.text: Really like it ...Very light weight as many people said. Works very well with android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pal

customer_reviews.title: What i expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item, of course there are many other radars out there for tons more money but to be honest I haven't had a radar detector that kept me from getting at least a ticket now & then. Does this work... Yes!! Does it work every time it should.... Probly not!! Has it saved me from multiple tix....Yes!!! Have I gotten a tix since having it....Yes!! (Only 1) if still buy this item again I do like it but nothing will keep you from getting a tix if you drive like an ads every where you go lol
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for several months now, an it can be summarized as the most user unfriendly radar detector I have ever used -and I've had dozens over the past 35 years. Very poor volume control, horrible menu function, and the contros are not intuitive. The battery voltage feature is worthless and blinds you at night. This unit will not function continously in my Chevy Volt as the auto off kills it after about 15 minutes. No turning off this feature that I could find. The only reason I gave two stars is that it provides adequate protection, but annoyingly so.
customer_reviews.author: David Pulkrabek

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money folks! Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Glover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little unit
customer_reviews.text: Appears accurate, nice size, covers all bands, and works well. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Best radar ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Radar on the market 100% without a doubt. Several comparison videos are on YouTube. Stop reading and buy now
customer_reviews.author: JMAG

customer_reviews.title: Chirps allot. Works well. Just runs too hot...
customer_reviews.text: Runs super hot to the touch. Chirps at truckers too much, maybe they use jammers, anyone know for sure? Won't run for long on my Chevy Volt dash power port maybe it senses too much heat load and turns it off every 30 minutes, Annoying, anyone know why? It has alerted me well enough to save me from old smokey and their nazi brand of harassment... Do yourself a favor if you drive everyday, get this one or a Valentine radar unit. Save yourself from an expensive worthless speeding ticket or another nonsense harassment pullover. The heads up app works great. It could save your life!
customer_reviews.author: Thunder-Blizzard-Lab

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on our anniversary , my husband loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Richa

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: bought this and doesnt even work. i can go right past a radar sign or a cop and it wont even go off for radar. wish i wouldve never bought this. dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Detector, few false alarms and always accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Very few false alarms when used properly... Bluetooth does get messed up and causes the detector to need a reset if the iRadar app is before a connection between phone and detector is made. Detected a police officer behind me a whole minute before he caught up to me (he was chasing another person) Does pickup some Walmart doors and such but no big deal... I know this device is accurate because I can guess when it starts detecting the doors of stores to the second while I drive passed. Ignore any bad reviews, works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M.

customer_reviews.title: SPX 7800BT would not power up
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't hate it as the 1 star represents, because it wouldn't power up! I had read a lot of complaints about this device right after I ordered it so I was having buyer's remorse but would have kept it if it worked and worked well. I never got the chance to see - it just would not power up at all. It also was not flat and I wanted to place it on a non-slip mat so that was also a problem but not a show stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent detection range and response time. The smallest detector out there but packs some premium features like voice and intellimute filtering.
customer_reviews.author: Afta E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price, made good, good fit, looks nice. I'm happy with and it did meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: battery drain on phone
customer_reviews.text: Works ok The APP is a drain on the battery even when no where near the car. You need to 'Force stop' the APP when not using it or it will kill the battery
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Radar!
customer_reviews.text: Very neat and fairly accurate. Awesome Bluetooth feature and LED Screen display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, blue tooth and icobra works great so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, blue tooth and icobra works great so far no complaints, I like that it's not too noisy
customer_reviews.author: Edison Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 11 months, now to see if I get an RMA...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this detector for 11 months and was pretty happy with it. HOWEVER, suddenly it stopped detecting everything but ambulances. Not even the false positives it used to give happen any more. Therefore I think it died and am waiting to see if Cobra will do the right thing with 1 month of warranty to go. UPDATE: Cobra sent me a brand new unit to replace the faulty one. However, I purchased another brand and sold the Cobra.
customer_reviews.author: Lydian Miles-Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Great device!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this radar. Works great and does the job its suppose to do. I don't see any disadvantages or things i don't like about this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L Minott

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Really sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily, works Great, helps keep me awake! Love the voice
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Gives train alerts on highway. 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: The worst radar in the history of mankind. its garbage and it told me that I was on a collision course with a train most of the times. Its so bad that I couldn't believe it a products this bad could exist. Having a real cobra snake would probably spot the cops more accurately. 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Bindiya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good not as many options that I was expecting but works good
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Laser side is iffy
customer_reviews.text: Its generally good but there are so many audis,porches etc around here that its always going nuts. The laser side i dont think is that great, the first time i was lucky and it picked it up pretty far away,one night i get picked up doing 78 in a 65 he said he hit me with laser and asked me if it even went off which it didnt. Luckily he didnt write me down for speeding. Should have went with escort or valentine.
customer_reviews.author: Austina

customer_reviews.title: Too many false positives
customer_reviews.text: Even when on max filtering the amount of false positives even on a highway with not much around is ridiculous. This thing is beeping non stop. On city max it's going crazy at level 5 and no cops around. It beeps at level one almost non stop. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great radar detector
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son to use with his iphone or without phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr LG Detail & Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector works really good paired to the iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Jim henson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Goes off when there's no law enforcement in the are(Isn't supposed to do that) Turns off randomly. Was expecting much more from this detector.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: A PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Lots of neat functions that don't really work. The FALSE signals are unbelievable. A real piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: KenJr

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Constantly received false alerts, but did give a couple seconds warning about upcoming speed traps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. A terrific upgrade from my previous cobra ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. A terrific upgrade from my previous cobra radar/laser detector. I particularly like the incorporation with my smart phone's GPS and Bluetooth for pinpoint accuracy and outstanding protection. Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Rueben Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Shipped very fast and was brand new never been opened. Let's hope for no speeding tickets now
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Just plug it in and it works. It's a little "boxy", however the device has made me aware of my speed on many occasions. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. The App can be a but Clumsy While Driving.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a stolen one. The App is helpful but can be a bit clumsy to try to use while driving. Be clear, the photo enforcement notifications come through the App and not the device. I drive a lot and this has paid for itself in saved tickets. This is a really good upper mid range radar detector or I would not have bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I thought mine was defective but
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was defective, and returned it But seeing the reviews I guess detecting trains in parking lots, and on the highway is normal. In addition even driving on highway on max city mode, it would go off constantly. The iPhone Bluetooth application seemed to be draining my battery
customer_reviews.author: Sith

customer_reviews.title: Good $100 level radar detector but if you have the money puy one with GPS and DSP.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as designed and was a good value. For a $100 radar detector it is ok. I like the smart phone app. So seller sold exactly what he/she advertised and did a good job. That said, for this radar detector, I would not buy it if I had the funds to buy one with DSP and builtin GPS. IF I only had about $100 this is a good radar detector.
customer_reviews.author: simmons

customer_reviews.title: "Great thing in a small package"
customer_reviews.text: Great little detector! Crazy range and accuracy! You'll be hard pressed to find a better radar detector for the money than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Hill

customer_reviews.title: EStock seller Defectives Radars
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 3 OF THIS FROM THE SELLER EStock,on september/15 ,this is a Refurbished items , the 3 Radar detectors are defectives,some times does not warn , and some times only when you ara a few yards from the speed camera . i have many fines , the time to return the items is only 1 month. the seller have the obligation to offer a tested product.and in perfect work conditions. bad.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Nass.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible. I live in the Chicago suburbs and I have had nothing but issues with this thing. There are a lot of newer Audi vehicles in the area and it goes off non stop when I am close to an Audi. It's very annoying. I would suggest buying something that isn't Cobra. This was a waste of money. I do not even use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bubb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice radar detector,small, only thing I don't like is car battery reading volts stays on screen...... cant hide
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tondra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Keeps turning off and doesn't pick up on all radar
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie McCoy

customer_reviews.title: it seems to work good gives you enough notice to slow down and the ...
customer_reviews.text: it seems to work good gives you enough notice to slow down and the I radar works well in urban areas but not so well in rural probably just because there's not enough people using it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has not let me down!!!! Has already "paid" for itself!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent have used in about 6 states and it has picked up in a wide variety of conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Neal Westermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best radar detector I've ever had. App is amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Detector but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good detector. Have no real issues. Works well with iRadar app. Only issue is that it recently began announcing railroad crossings. However, there are none on my route to or from work. Maybe an update to the app is needed?
customer_reviews.author: James Barker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. It does more than than we realized.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Inman

customer_reviews.title: Works great w few false alarms
customer_reviews.text: Paid for itself . Just got a second one. Both have saved a tkt. difficult to sync w the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Oh

customer_reviews.title: Overall the product picks up just about every cop but ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product picks up just about every cop but it broke a month and a half after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Arek Lafond

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good radar detector
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good radar detector. The possibility of use in different bands os excellent and ir works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo Gelain

customer_reviews.title: Could be the best if I could connect it
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt this could be the best in the world if I could connect it. Power adapter does not fit lighter socket nor power socket (tío big) I have read many reviews with this problem. Btw my ride is a Jetta
customer_reviews.author: Electronics lover

customer_reviews.title: wish to fix the review contact me
customer_reviews.text: the damn think it turning it self on and off every 45 minutes try to go trough setting cant find to make to stay in on position some time will work for 2 H than again keep resetting it self.
customer_reviews.author: nedomedo

customer_reviews.title: Radar seems to work too good at times
customer_reviews.text: Radar seems to work too good at times. My last trip to Texas from Indiana was a mess. The unit went off all the time, X & KA bands through ark. I ended up unplugging 1/2 through the state and most of the way back home. The whole trip through ark I saw two cops which the unit picked them up.
customer_reviews.author: winn-faye

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with this model
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this model . It is well worth the money I here the Radar Alert long before I see the cruiser . Years ago I bought a Cobra Radar Detector and it saved me at least a Thousand dollars in fines alone. I would defiantly recommend this purchase to anyone who drives on public roads .
customer_reviews.author: Rob Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS AT THE 2015.... Screen NO LONGER/ WORKS.16 months - life for an LCD screen is unacceptable...Highly inaccurate!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tomski

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable Performance
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the iRAD 950 iRAD ATOM Radar Detector. The only glitch this unit has is the inaccurate battery readings on the colour display. The voltage reading is almost 1 volt inaccurate, therefore if the actual voltage in the vehicle is 13.4V this Detector says its 12.4V. Cobra needs to re calibrate their devices.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Mahabir

customer_reviews.title: Very cool concept though
customer_reviews.text: Alot of false positives. Very cool concept though, esp when used in conjunction w app. However screen brightness fails (after 1 yr of use), on highest setting cant see during the day- barely able to see at night, thus lcd screen is useless.. Better off getting the cheaper models without the lcd.
customer_reviews.author: A*

customer_reviews.title: Picks up EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector picks up police car radars, aftermarket GPS units, tractor trailers, businesses, and numerous other irrelevant signals, however it will not pick up the police radars that shows your speed (usually set up on the side of the road). I have an older model Cobra XRS 9340 that was more reliable than this model and I purchased it 7 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: JWinn12

customer_reviews.title: It always gave false reading and it was annoying. The only thing that I liked about it ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked but only certain times. It always gave false reading and it was annoying. The only thing that I liked about it was it had the Bluetooth feature. I returned it after I got pulled over. I was hoping that Cobra products made a big change but I was wrong. I'll never buy a Cobra radar detector.
customer_reviews.author: norman loethen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This detector met and exceeded my expectations and I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Its me

customer_reviews.title: Great choice from a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says. Great choice from a trusted brand.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Burks

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: The radar by itself works ok a few false alarms but I can live with that. The Bluetooth connection is horrible and the cobra Iradar app is even worse, very buggy on Android and I would not suggest buying this unit. I thought for the price of the unit and features that are listed I would give this a try, but I guess you get what you pay for. Does not work as advertised. Im returning and buying a passport 9500ix.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Saves me from speed cameras installed on 4 lane highways that run near small rural towns. I'm not a speed demon, but the speed limit changes 25 times in a one our commute to work on a four lane country highway.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: a very good radar detector but it uses your data plan on ...
customer_reviews.text: a very good radar detector but it uses your data plan on your phone which can be sometimes too much if you have a data plan that is limited
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS HOWARD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Far more better than escort and rest of the cobra out there.
customer_reviews.author: DUMB HUSKY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Installed and saved myself three tickets in one day. Really good product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It has saved the day twice now!

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: There are better, but for the price, it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: MissMorgan99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of false alarms on default mode but it did detect ALL cops with radar on. Paid for itself:)
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!! This item stopped working totally shortly after I bought it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Salamon B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, time and will just make you more paranoid.
customer_reviews.text: So many false alarms! I bought this for a 14hr road trip one way and since I was leading the pack I'd get one of these and wouldn't get anymore tickets in those communist states we pass through. Jeez it literally goes off at everything no matter the mode. 100 miles between towns and a wide open area for miles and this stupid thing is screaming it's head off. And it's just not for one signal either, everything possible!! Vg2, railroad crossing, emergency vehicle, X, k, kv or whatever. But if I did see a cop id see him scanning in median wayyy before this thing would even beep, boop or wake up shortly before I passed him.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy.
customer_reviews.text: Has false alerts and pops up there is a train coming every so often. It has yet to go off when I drive by a cop.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does good I like it , I just don't have no owners manual

product_meta.title: Cobra Electronics SPX 7800BT Maximum Performance Radar/Laser/Camera Detector
product_meta.description: Model:SPX 7800BTCobra TOPOF LINE RADAR DETECTOR Customer Service number: 773-889-3087 Cobra Electronics website at: https://www.cobra.com/support for all Cobra manuals and customer service contact.
feature_bullets: Ultra-low-noise, signal amplifiers that once were affordable only to military systems
Low-microwave-loss circuitry utilizing gold-plated circuit boards
Use of flip-chip Mixer/Multiplier diodes in packages that were once unattainable
First Local Oscillator Transistor (Super-low-noise, high-mobility J-FET) that has been chosen to optimize signal gain, output power, and low noise characteristics over its frequency range
Powerful CPU that enables sweeping of the entire police radar band spectrum in less than 240 milliseconds
